name: Data engineer [Oil & Gas] - Trainee
description:
TotalEnergies needs talented Trainee to build oil & gas fields data base, participate to production forecasting with Moscow and HQ specialists, build a “dashboard” to display key production and reserves figures, trends, maps, build fields “databooks”

Activities:

- Propose methodology, build, maintain and share comprehensive oil & gas fields data base (including reserves and production history, long-term and short-term production forecasts)

- Deliver short-term and long-term production forecasts

- Analyse oil & gas fields performance, provide reports fact vs plan and explain difference

- Propose methodology to build a tool to display key production and reserves figures, trends, maps (“dashboard”)

- Follow-up oil & gas fields activities using all available sources of information, build fields “databooks”

- Respect and promoting HSE rules

Welcome to reply if you are:

- Bachelor or Master’s degree in mathematics, Physics or Reservoir /Petroleum Engineering

- have basic knowledge of reservoir / petroleum engineering would be an advantage

- Good in Excel, VBA, SQL or Python

- speak English well
